data.name: 病毒恶化 VirusCrisis
data.detailed_description:
Official Qq Group: 721970357

[q: What Is This Game? [/h2]

a: This is a very coquettish doomsday game

q: Can You Network?

a: No /h2]

q: Is there A Young Lady Inside?

a: There is a young lady, a little brother, and a mixture of brothers and sisters.

q: What Can I Do In This Game?

a: You played a high school student in the game. You have to lead other school sisters, brothers and brothers to tide over the difficulties together. You can assign different characters to explore, recruit, and talk. Wait……

q: How many characters are there in the game?

a: 50 characters. The script is currently out of 30.

q: What kind of category does your game belong to?

a: Some people think it is gal game. Some people think it is a strategy, and some people think it is a card class. (October card system) In fact, the author does not know what category.

q: A few people do the game, it looks very low.

a: 2 people do full-time, one producer, one development. Others are outsourcing resources.

q: Is there a dubbing, is everyone having a script?

a: Some people have voiceovers, and some have not yet installed. The script is currently only 27/5.

q: Is Your Game Serious?

a: Not Serious, But A Bit Cruel.

q: How many sisters are there? Is there anything I want?

a: There are many sisters, but this one Serious game, no such content...

q: Then you are a little bit of a game, a key ctrl to chase the end right? After receiving CG, I will refund it~

a: No, different characters and characters will have different plots, and your choice will also affect the direction of the game.

q: You don't have much praise in this game, but the bad reviews are quite a lot.

a: Yes, We welcome praise and bad reviews, and if you want to say it, let me say it.

q: Do you now sell this game with such a good conscience?

a: Dubbing actors, screenwriters, dynamic painting, development, different background images, original music, sound effects, etc... are all costs, games, we are also overpriced.

q: I Won't Play This Broken Game.

a: There are some anchors on the youtube channel and the b station. Can go and see

q: Planning to Die.

a: Ok.

data.short_description: Virus Crisis is a Roguelike RPG indie game with abundant stories and endings.You will be a high school student who encounters a Zombie virus outbreak and try to survive(or fall in love) with your girl teammates in the apocalypse. You need to lead everyone to survive with your wisdom and bravery.
data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5-2400 @3.60GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 640
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i7-4790 @3.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 640
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
